trans-unit.source: Specifies how to retrieve additional information about the subject of a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.

Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding> class to specify how to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject within a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security token.
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated.
The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement>.
An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> asserts that the statement's subject was authenticated by a particular means at a particular time.

An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthenticationStatement> also has an optional <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding>, which specifies how to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject.

Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding%2A> properties to retrieve additional information about an authenticated subject.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding"></xref> class using the specified query types, protocol binding, and SAML authority location.
A URI reference that identifies the SAML protocol binding to use when communicating with the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject.
A URI reference that describes how to locate and communicate with the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject.
Gets or sets the type of queries that the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject, responds to.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind%2A> property corresponds to the `AuthorityKind` attribute of the `<AuthorityBinding>` element, as defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName"></xref> that represents the type of queries that the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject, responds to.

The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind"></xref> property is set and the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly"></xref> property is `true`.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.AuthorityKind"></xref> property is set to `null`.
Gets or sets the SAML protocol binding to use when communicating with the SAML authority that has additional information that has additional information about the subject.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding%2A> property corresponds to the `Binding` attribute of the `<AuthorityBinding>` element defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
A URI reference that identifies the SAML protocol binding to use when communicating with the SAML authority that has additional information that has additional information about the subject.

The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding"></xref> property is set and the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly"></xref> property is `true`.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Binding"></xref> property is set to `null`.
Gets a value indicating whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
`true` if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets or sets how to locate and communicate with the SAML authority that has additional information that has additional information about the subject.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location%2A> property corresponds to the `Location` attribute of the `<AuthorityBinding>` element defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS SAML specification.
A URI reference that describes how to locate and communicate with the SAML authority that has additional information about the subject.

The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location"></xref> property is set and the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly"></xref> property is `true`.
The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.Location"></xref> property is set to `null`.
Causes this instance to be read-only.
When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorityBinding.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`.
Reads the `<AuthorityBinding>` element from the specified XML reader.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader"></xref> to read the `<AuthorityBinding>` element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML assertion that are defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the `KeyInfo` clause of the digital signature.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
reader is `null`
-or-
samlSerializer is `null`
The `<AuthorityBinding>` element does not have one of the `AuthorityKind`, `Location`, or `Binding` attributes.
Writes the `<AuthorityBinding>` element into the specified XML serializer.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter"></xref> to write the `<AuthorityBinding>` element.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in the SAML assertion that is defined in the SAML specification.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing `KeyInfo` clauses.
writer is `null`
-or-
samlSerializer is `null`
